structureddatamarkup.type.title: MARKUP TYPE
structureddatamarkup.type.description: Select the JSON-LD option to add the script tag containing JSON-LD schema information to the html head section. This option affects the markup for all items.

structureddatamarkup.availabilityonbacko.title: OUT OF STOCK BEHAVIOR (WHEN ITEM BACK ORDERS ARE ALLOWED)
structureddatamarkup.availabilityonbacko.description: Select one of these availability options to define how out of stock items are handled when back orders are allowed. This option affects the markup for all items.
